      • extractTargets

        ImmutableList<BuildTarget> extractTargets(BuildTarget target,
                                        String input)
                                          throws MacroException
        Returns:
        any build targets references by this macro. To be used in ImplicitDepsInferringDescription.findDepsForTargetFromConstructorArgs(com.facebook.buck.model.BuildTarget, T) to extract implicit deps hidden behind macros.
        Throws:
        MacroException
